original_text: Then the Lord said to Moses, ‘You must now leave here with the people that you brought out of Egypt. You must take them to the land that I promised to Abraham, Isaac and Jacob. I made a serious promise to them that I would give the land to their descendants.
korean_text: 여호와께서 모세에게 이르시되 너는 네가 애굽 땅에서 인도하여 낸 백성과 함께 여기를 떠나서 내가 아브라함과 이삭과 야곱에게 맹세하여 네 자손에게 주기로 한 그 땅으로 올라가라

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord said to Moses
You must now leave here with the people
that you brought out of Egypt
You must take them to the land
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그들을 그 땅으로 인도해야 한다

sentences.original_text: that I promised to Abraham, Isaac and Jacob
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 아브라함과 이삭과 야곱에게 약속한 땅으로

sentences.original_text: I made a serious promise to them
that I would give the land to their descendants
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그 땅을 그들의 자손에게 주겠다고
